name: multiTranslateLoader
usage: A utility function that returns a TranslateModuleConfig with multiple files support.

inputs.name: config
inputs.text: Additional optional config options for the TranslateModule

tokens.name: TRANSLATION_FILES
tokens.text: An array with the translation files to load.

name: getTranslateLoader
usage: A factory that returns a MultiTranslateHttpLoader instance. It should only be directly used if multiTranslateLoader could not be used.

name: MultiTranslateHttpLoader
usage: An handler to load multiple translation files. It should only be directly used if neither multiTranslateLoader nor getTranslateLoader could be used.
